thread.title: Beau Ryan announces wife Kara's pregnancy on Instagram | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Beau Ryan announces wife Kara's pregnancy on Instagram | Daily Mail Online

author: Jody Phan
title: Beau Ryan announces wife Kara's pregnancy on Instagram | Daily Mail Online
text: Share 111 shares The sentiment was echoed by Kara on her own Instagram account, sharing the same image and message. The family's news comes just weeks after Beau and Kara were spotted looking happy and loved-up while enjoying a day at the beach. Kara kept her bump under wraps in a frilly, polka-dot one-piece, while shielding her face from the sun with pair of sunglasses. Bumping along nicely! Kara was spotted showing off her figure in a frilly one-piece as she enjoyed a day at the beach in Bronte just weeks earlier Loved-up: The blonde beauty put on an amorous display with her husband as they soaked up the sun on the packed beach The beauty salon worker stunned in the plunging bathers as she strutted along the sand. Kara and Beau looked upbeat as they went for a dip at Sydney's packed Bronte Beach. And on New Year's Day, the couple enjoyed an idyllic cruise with their friends and family. Taking to Instagram at the time, the pregnant beauty stunned as she showed off her figure in another black swimsuit, wrapping her arms around her man. 'We had the best day out on the boat today bringing in the the New Year with our family and Friends,' Kara shared. 'Three, soon to be four': Married since 2012, the happy couple are already proud parents to four-year-old daughter Remi 'Excited. Happy. Blessed': Kara echoed the news on her own social media page, sharing the same sweet message and photo It appeared she was attempting to keep her bump under the radar by shielding it with her hand, while posing behind Beau. The news of Kara's pregnancy comes over a year after the family was rocked by Beau's alleged cheating scandal. The former Wests Tigers player reportedly had an affair with former Hi-5 singer Lauren Brant, whom he met while working on the stage production of Aladdin. In early 2016, Kara opened up about the alleged 'cheating' scandal that rocked her marriage, telling Woman's Day : 'I was actually more worried for Beau, if I'm honest.' Cruising along nicely: Kara took to Instagram on New Year's Day to share a loved-up snap with her husband, seemingly keeping her bump under the radar in a black swimsuit 'I'm probably emotionally stronger than Beau, and I could see how upset he was, so I was more concerned for him and our family,' she confessed. Despite the allegations, Kara maintained Beau was still a good husband and father to Remi. 'The grass isn't always greener, and while it was a difficult situation, running from anything in life is never the answer,' she said. Scandal: Kara's pregnancy comes over a year after their family was rocked by Beau's alleged affair with former Hi-5 singer Lauren Brant (pictured) Doting dad: Despite the allegations, Beau's wife and childhood sweetheart Kara insisted he was still a good father and husband It was reported Beau had an 'affair' with children's entertainer Lauren Brant while preparing for the Aladdin And His Wondrous Lamp stage show in 2015. At the time, Lauren's ex-fianc√© Warren Riley told Woman's Day he discovered text messages which he claims proved their relationship. After keeping tight-lipped for weeks after the news broke, Beau addressed the headlines upon his return to the NRL Footy Show. Staying strong: Kara opened up about Beau's alleged indiscretion, telling Woman's Day she was 'more concerned for him and our family' than herself 'Firstly, I just want to apologise to all the people who have been hurt recently. It's been really, really hard for myself and my family and everyone involved,' he said. 'I want to thank everyone for their support, and thank everyone who has been very respectful of our privacy - I'd love for people to continue to do that.' Beau and Kara were childhood sweet hearts and announced their engagement while the blonde was pregnant with their daughter Remi in August 2012. They tied the knot just two months later. Childhood sweet hearts: The pair were engaged while Kara was pregnant with their four-year-old daughter Remi, and married in 2012
